items.title: Which Variety is Right for Me?

einfuehrung.lead: Today, there are over 100 documented Kava varieties that differ significantly in origin, chemotype, and effect. In Vanuatu alone, the presumed homeland of the plant, more than 80 different cultivars are known. This diversity is the result of over 3,000 years of targeted selection by Pacific cultures.
einfuehrung.text: The differences between the varieties are not just academic – they significantly determine the effect a Kava drink produces. A Kelai from Vanuatu acts completely differently than a Loa Waka from Fiji. Understanding these differences is key to a conscious and satisfying Kava experience.

nobleTudei.title: Noble Kava vs. Tudei Kava
nobleTudei.intro: The most important distinction that every Kava consumer must know is between Noble Kava and Tudei Kava. This classification was introduced by the government of Vanuatu and is based on the chemotype of the respective variety.

noble.title: Noble Kava
items: Selected over centuries for pleasant effects
Chemotype starts with 2 or 4, never with 5 or 6
Duration of effect: 3-6 hours, fades cleanly
noble.examples: Borogu, Melo Melo, Kelai, Palasa, Pouni Ono

tudei.title: Tudei Kava (Two-Day)
items: Effect lasts extremely long (up to 2 days)

nobleTudei.warning: When purchasing, ensure that the vendor specifies the chemotype and exact variety. This transparency is a good sign of authentic Noble Kava.
nobleTudei.linkText: Learn more about Noble vs. Tudei

wirktypen.title: The Three Effect Types
wirktypen.intro: Noble Kava varieties are classified into three categories based on their dominant effects. This classification is based on the chemotype – that is, the relative concentration of the six main kavalactones.

heady.title: Heady
heady.description: Head-focused effect: Euphoria, mental clarity, sociability. Ideal for daytime and social occasions.

balanced.title: Balanced
balanced.description: Balanced effect: Relaxation without fatigue, mental calmness with physical well-being.

heavy.title: Heavy
heavy.description: Body-focused effect: Deep muscle relaxation, sedation, ideal for the evening and for sleeping.

regionen.title: Overview of Growing Regions
regionen.intro: Kava is now grown in various regions of the Pacific. Each region has developed its own varieties adapted to the local climate and cultural preferences.

auswahl.tip: Start with a Balanced Kava like Melo Melo or Borogu. These varieties provide a pleasant, balanced experience without extreme effects in one direction.
